title: Is Python ready for the Enterprise?
description:
There seems to be an opinion among some developers that Python isn't
suitable for Enterprise. To put it another way, Python is great for
small tasks where a scripting language works well, but not so suitable
for more complicated software stacks. This talk tries to address some of
these concerns. Specifically, we will look at:

-  Python Typing System for large code bases.
-  Is the GIL a problem?
-  The speed of Python execution.
-  The speed of Python development.
-  A case study: Caterpillar.
